greetingMessage.upbeat: The %PERSONALITY% %NAME% is staring at you, with a glint in its eye.

idleWarningMessage.upbeat: The spider seems to be planning an escape.
idleWarningMessage.timid: The spider seems to be planning an escape.
idleWarningMessage.irritable: The spider seems to be planning an escape.
idleWarningMessage.gloomy: The spider seems to be planning an escape.

initialItemOfferMessage.timid: The spider cautiously nudges %ITEM% towards you.
initialItemOfferMessage.gloomy: The spider drops %ITEM% in front of you.

furtherItemOfferMessage.upbeat: The spider is smirking as it presents %ITEM%.
furtherItemOfferMessage.timid: The spider seems distressed as it pushes forth %ITEM%.
furtherItemOfferMessage.irritable: The spider throws out %ITEM% with mighty force.
furtherItemOfferMessage.gloomy: The spider appears unmoving as %ITEM% is brought forth.

furtherItemOfferMessageVariant.upbeat: The spider's curious glare continues as a %ITEM% comes out.
furtherItemOfferMessageVariant.timid: The spider's presentations continue cautiously as it presents %ITEM%.
furtherItemOfferMessageVariant.irritable: The spider seems to hesitate with fury before unveiling %ITEM%.
furtherItemOfferMessageVariant.gloomy: A %ITEM% is dragged out by the spider.

initialMoneyOfferMessage.upbeat: The spider unveils %MONEY%, though it's not clear where from...
initialMoneyOfferMessage.gloomy: The spider plucks %MONEY% from its hairs.

furtherMoneyOfferMessage.upbeat: A total of %MONEY% seems to have been retrieved from the same origin...
furtherMoneyOfferMessage.timid: The spider slowly adds to the pile, for a total of %MONEY%.
furtherMoneyOfferMessage.irritable: More is spat at you, totalling %MONEY% overall.
furtherMoneyOfferMessage.gloomy: From a deeper dive into its filth, the spider makes for a total of %MONEY%.

furtherMoneyOfferMessageVariant.upbeat: As the mystery of the origin deepens, so does the value as the spider presents a total of %MONEY%.
furtherMoneyOfferMessageVariant.timid: With great hesitation, the pile is expanded further for a total of %MONEY%.
furtherMoneyOfferMessageVariant.irritable: The spider seems to now be depositing from the less favourable end for a total of %MONEY%.
furtherMoneyOfferMessageVariant.gloomy: You gag as the spider retrieves from within itself once again, totalling %MONEY%.

powerSuccessMessage.upbeat: The spider shoots off with a spring in its step as it leaves behind %POWER% power.
powerSuccessMessage.timid: The spider takes its leave, rushing for solace, as it leaves behind %POWER% power.
powerSuccessMessage.irritable: The spider scurries off, leaving behind a %POWER% power.
powerSuccessMessage.gloomy: The spider slowly crawls off as it drops behind %POWER% power.

powerTrees.text: The spider doesn't seem to understand...

successResponses.upbeat: The spider appears to be chuckling back at you...
successResponses.timid: You got the spider's attention!
successResponses.irritable: The spider appears to be... bowing?
successResponses.gloomy: The spider shows some signs of attention...

failureResponses.upbeat: The spider noisily leaps out!
failureResponses.timid: The spider's become defensive!
failureResponses.irritable: The spider's loudly readying an attack!
failureResponses.gloomy: The spider's groaning with a deadly stare!

successResponses.upbeat: The spider's started moving in slow motion. It appears to be mocking you.
successResponses.timid: The spider seems to be understanding a little better now?
successResponses.gloomy: The spider seems a little more interested now.

failureResponses.upbeat: The spider excitedly leaps out at speed!
failureResponses.timid: The spider's become defensive!
failureResponses.irritable: The spider looks to be readying an attack and definitely not slowly!
failureResponses.gloomy: It's no use. The spider isn't responding!

successResponses.upbeat: The spider seems to have taken that as some sort of game.
successResponses.timid: The spider remains silent...
successResponses.irritable: The spider seems to be waiting for you...
successResponses.gloomy: The spider remains silent...

failureResponses.upbeat: The spider looks to have become bored. It's looking for other entertainment!
failureResponses.timid: The spider's become cynical of you!
failureResponses.irritable: The spider's patience has worn thin! It's become aggressive!
failureResponses.gloomy: The spider's giving you an unnerving glare...

children.text: It seems to be eyeing up your inventory...

successResponses.upbeat: The spider's starting a staring competition!
successResponses.timid: The spider is easing off...
successResponses.irritable: ... Neither of you are breaking down.
successResponses.gloomy: The spider is gradually drifting its eyes away.

failureResponses.upbeat: The spider's gaze has turned to you and become more deadly!
failureResponses.timid: The spider seems to now be considering something more nefarious!
failureResponses.irritable: The spider's become agitated!
failureResponses.gloomy: The spider seems to have given up talking!

successResponses.upbeat: Seems the spider knows that's the oldest trick in the book! It's smirking!
successResponses.timid: Got 'em! The spider seems ashamed to have fallen for that.
successResponses.gloomy: It didn't even bother looking up to notice...

failureResponses.upbeat: Bad idea! The spider looks like it's about to play its own trick!
failureResponses.timid: The spider's shying away...
failureResponses.irritable: Now it's irritated!
failureResponses.gloomy: It doesn't seem amused...

successResponses.upbeat: The spider nods back.
successResponses.timid: It seems rather dismayed by your response...
successResponses.irritable: The spider has retracted its attention.
successResponses.gloomy: It seems rather dismayed by your response...

failureResponses.upbeat: The spider's shaking something up! It's readying to attack!'
failureResponses.timid: It's lost interest in negotiation!
failureResponses.irritable: That's riled it up!
failureResponses.gloomy: It's lost the will to continue on!

children.text: It appears to be deep in thought...

successResponses.upbeat: Oddly enough, it still doesn't seem to understand.
successResponses.timid: The spider appears concerned about your repetitive nature.
successResponses.gloomy: The look it's giving you... The spider may be starting to take you for a parrot.

failureResponses.upbeat: That's done it! It's had enough fun and games!
failureResponses.timid: The spider hasn't taken kindly to that!
failureResponses.irritable: Once might've been enough! Now you're in trouble!
failureResponses.gloomy: It doesn't seem to have much hope for your intellect...

responses.text: Pull a pose like The Thinker.

successResponses.upbeat: That seems to have humoured it. It seems friendlier now!
successResponses.timid: The spider seems to genuinely think you're in deep thought...
successResponses.irritable: The spider gives you a nod.
successResponses.gloomy: It seems more at ease now.

failureResponses.upbeat: There's no denying the face it's giving you - It thinks you look ridiculous!
failureResponses.timid: It hasn't taken well to being mocked!
failureResponses.irritable: Looks like it doesn't have time for tomfoolery!
failureResponses.gloomy: That's set it off!

successResponses.upbeat: It's getting its boogie on!
successResponses.timid: It seems like it wants to learn this tune...
successResponses.irritable: Whistling a calming tune seems to have appeased it.
successResponses.gloomy: Whistling a gloomy tune, it seems to relate.

failureResponses.upbeat: Looks like it's not a fan!
failureResponses.timid: It seems to prefer silence!
failureResponses.irritable: It's lost its train of thought - Now it's mad!
failureResponses.gloomy: No bueno. That's irritated it!

successResponses.upbeat: It's got its eyes on you now!
successResponses.timid: It's looking up with fear in its eyes.
successResponses.irritable: You've got its full attention with that!
successResponses.gloomy: It's giving you a look... But at least it's paying attention.

failureResponses.upbeat: It's snapping back!
failureResponses.timid: It hasn't responded well to hostility!
failureResponses.irritable: That enraged it!
failureResponses.gloomy: It's turned on you!

successResponses.upbeat: It seems to have enjoyed that.
successResponses.timid: It looks like it's taken the message of the story to heart... Somehow.
successResponses.irritable: Its eyes are on you now. It might be waiting for another.
successResponses.gloomy: It quietly listened. Seems you have its attention.

failureResponses.upbeat: Doesn't look like it's a fan of the classics!
failureResponses.timid: It hasn't taken the moral of the story to heart!
failureResponses.irritable: No good. It's at a higher reading level.
failureResponses.gloomy: It doesn't appear to appreciate the happy ending.

responses.text: Stare into its deep red eyes...

successResponses.upbeat: As your eyes lock, you lean in for a kiss... Eurgh. No. It's a spider. Enough of that. At least that's garnered some attention...
successResponses.timid: It's blushing...
successResponses.irritable: It's certainly more engaged now, and perhaps a little attracted...
successResponses.gloomy: It's staring back, right into your very soul, with a longing for love in it's 8 sparkling peepers.

failureResponses.upbeat: The eyes are looking a little angrier now. Here it comes!
failureResponses.timid: That seems to have made it uncomfortable...
failureResponses.irritable: It hasn't got time for that. Watch out!
failureResponses.gloomy: It doesn't appear to be in the mood...

children.text: The spider is beckoning you closer...

successResponses.upbeat: The spider seems elated! It's sniffing you up.
successResponses.timid: It's become more at ease.
successResponses.irritable: Your prompt response seems to have appeased it!
successResponses.gloomy: Its demeanour seems to be slightly happier to have you close.

failureResponses.upbeat: It was a trick! Watch out!
failureResponses.timid: Too close! It's retaliating!
failureResponses.irritable: It was a revenge trick! Watch out!
failureResponses.gloomy: Looks like it wanted you to come closer for a fight!

successResponses.upbeat: It's slowly edging towards you instead!
successResponses.timid: It seems to relate to your shyness.
successResponses.irritable: The spider seems to respect your determined stance!
successResponses.gloomy: Your decision has sent the spider into deep thought...

failureResponses.upbeat: Not one for a stand-off it seems! Here it comes!
failureResponses.timid: It doesn't seem to trust you anymore!
failureResponses.irritable: It's grown impatient! Watch out!
failureResponses.gloomy: It didn't appreciate your hesitation.

successResponses.upbeat: It's coming over, with a skip in its step!
successResponses.timid: It's approaching cautiously...
successResponses.irritable: It's coming over, though seems to have a bit of a huff on!
successResponses.gloomy: It appears curious as it slogs its way over.

failureResponses.upbeat: It's charging over!!!
failureResponses.timid: It seems to suspect you're up to something. Watch out!
failureResponses.irritable: It's not having any of that!
failureResponses.gloomy: It can't be bothered. It's grown more hostile.

successResponses.upbeat: The spider seems curious about your items.
successResponses.timid: It's inspecting your items with awe.
successResponses.irritable: It appears to be quite impressed!
successResponses.gloomy: It seems perplexed by your treasures...

failureResponses.upbeat: It doesn't look too impressed!
failureResponses.timid: It doesn't agree with your wealth!
failureResponses.irritable: It hasn't taken well to your showing off!
failureResponses.gloomy: It's become rather bored...

successResponses.upbeat: It's joined in a synchronised dance!
successResponses.timid: It appears rather impressed!
successResponses.irritable: It seems to appreciate your skill.
successResponses.gloomy: It looks to be reading into your dance...

failureResponses.upbeat: It was a ruse! It's laughing at you!
failureResponses.timid: It's intimidated by your raw skill. It knows it could never match up...
failureResponses.irritable: It doesn't appear to be a fan of that favour of dance...
failureResponses.gloomy: It doesn't seem keen on the mainstream dance style...

successResponses.upbeat: It appears flabbergasted by this new revelation!
successResponses.timid: It's carefully reflecting on this new knowledge...
successResponses.irritable: It seems to appreciate your teachings.
successResponses.gloomy: It appears to be pondering over the meaning of life...

failureResponses.upbeat: You've bored it!
failureResponses.timid: It feels stupid...
failureResponses.irritable: It's offended by the simplicity of your teachings.
failureResponses.gloomy: It appears disinterested.

powerTrees.text: The spider is trying to get away...

successResponses.upbeat: You successfully held it back!
successResponses.timid: You managed to keep it around!
successResponses.irritable: The spider appears to respect your might and remains.
successResponses.gloomy: The spider is curious of your intentions...

failureResponses.upbeat: No use! It's too fast!
failureResponses.timid: No use! It's scuttled away in fear!
failureResponses.irritable: No use! It's determined to shoot off!
failureResponses.gloomy: No use! It's evading all attempts with reckless abandon!

successResponses.upbeat: It's circled back around! It might've wanted to play chase.
successResponses.timid: The spider stuck around after your kindness, it doesn't appear so intimidated anymore.
successResponses.gloomy: It seems curious as to why you would let it get away...

failureResponses.upbeat: It's turned back with aggression!
failureResponses.timid: Gah! It was a trick to strike back!
failureResponses.irritable: It was distancing for an attack!
failureResponses.gloomy: It's returning the favour, and not in a good way!

successResponses.upbeat: It seems humoured by your weakness and has stuck around.
successResponses.timid: It's staying around to relieve you of your turmoil...
successResponses.irritable: It seems to appreciate your honesty and has stuck around.
successResponses.gloomy: It's struck by your unusual behaviour!

failureResponses.upbeat: It's taken that as a sign of weakness!
failureResponses.timid: It's ineffective!
failureResponses.irritable: It's annoyed by your blubbering. Watch out!
failureResponses.gloomy: It seems disinterested in your plea.

children.text: It looks like it might want to join you on your adventures...

successResponses.upbeat: It seems relatively unfazed!
successResponses.timid: It seems to have appreciated the soft response!
successResponses.irritable: It seems to understand.
successResponses.gloomy: It appears disappointed, but understanding.

failureResponses.upbeat: It hasn't taken that well!
failureResponses.timid: That's upset it!
failureResponses.irritable: That's offended it!
failureResponses.gloomy: It's consumed with despair!

successResponses.upbeat: It's acting like it wasn't serious anyway! There's no way of telling if it was or not...
successResponses.irritable: It seems appeased by your direct nature!
successResponses.gloomy: Looks like it was anticipating that response...

failureResponses.upbeat: It's ready to send you to the reject pile! Watch out!
failureResponses.timid: That's shaken it to the core!
failureResponses.irritable: It doesn't appear to appreciate your tone.
failureResponses.gloomy: It's now longing for something more... deadly.

successResponses.upbeat: It's humoured by your attempt to look cool!
successResponses.timid: It seems to understand...
successResponses.irritable: It's impressed!
successResponses.gloomy: It appears to relate to the sombre lifestyle...

failureResponses.upbeat: It hasn't taken that well!
failureResponses.timid: That's upset it!
failureResponses.irritable: That's offended it!
failureResponses.gloomy: It's consumed with despair!

children.text: It seems curious about who you are...

successResponses.upbeat: It seems pretty confident it can sniff you out.
successResponses.timid: It appears enamoured with your mysterious persona!
successResponses.irritable: It seems a little antsy about not knowing.
successResponses.gloomy: It too seems to be harbouring secrets...

failureResponses.upbeat: Looks like it's tired of playing ''Guess Who?''!
failureResponses.timid: That seems to have destroyed any trust it had!
failureResponses.irritable: Seems it's not keen on not knowing!
failureResponses.gloomy: It can sense your weak attempt to be honest edgy.

responses.text: Tell it you're a fancy banker.

successResponses.upbeat: Looks like you may have just set yourself up as the Monopoly banker for Spider Games night next week.
successResponses.timid: It seems to appreciate your supposed honesty... Better not tell it too much more.
successResponses.irritable: It... Looks like it wants financial advice?
successResponses.gloomy: It's dreaming about such a life for itself...

failureResponses.upbeat: Nope. It's not buying that.
failureResponses.timid: It appears to be offended that you would think it so gullible.
failureResponses.irritable: It's not taken well to your joking around!
failureResponses.gloomy: It seems a little too down on how its life turned out... Be careful!

successResponses.upbeat: It seems to have really enjoyed the parts where you failed.
successResponses.timid: Understanding you better, it seems closer now.
successResponses.irritable: It's listening intently - Seems honesty is the best policy!
successResponses.gloomy: It's enamoured by your story...

failureResponses.upbeat: You've bored it into madness! Watch out!
failureResponses.timid: It's edging away, feeling I sufficient against your achievements.
failureResponses.irritable: Your over-answering has really rather irritated it.
failureResponses.gloomy: Its become disinterested....
